sn2.8:1.2: Atha kho tayano devaputto puranatitthakaro abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn2.8:1.3: Ekamantam thito kho tayano devaputto bhagavato santike ima gathayo abhasi:
sn2.8:7.2: idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
sn2.8:8.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
sn2.8:8.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim tayano nama devaputto puranatitthakaro abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn2.8:8.3: Ekamantam thito kho, bhikkhave, tayano devaputto mama santike ima gathayo abhasi:
sn2.8:14.1: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, tayano devaputto, idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
